mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Returns enclosed certificate [lacking]; lands in Louisiana, cases of individuals interested in N.C. are within competence of Congress; acquisition of Floridas and exchange of lands with Indians are important but time and favorable incidents must be waited for accomplishment.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1805 September 19, Monticello [Albermarle County, Virginia] to Joshua Prout, n.p.
